news.title: Trump announces 30% tariffs on EU and Mexico, starting Aug. 1
news.summary: President Donald Trump has sent similar letters to 23 other U.S. trading partners this week. The countries include Canada, Japan and Brazil.

news.title: Federal Reserve quietly responds to Trump administration attacks over renovation
news.summary: The central bank is quietly pushing back with a new "Frequently Asked Questions" page on its website. The page defends the central bank's renovation.

news.title: Trump threatens to revoke comedian Rosie O’Donnell's citizenship
news.summary: President Donald Trump is threatening to use the executive branch to target his opponents. It's a dramatic escalation of President Donald Trump's threats to target opponents.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat about these dividend-paying stocks
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service highlights three dividend-paying stocks. ConocoPhillips and U.S. Bancorp are favored by Wall Street's top pros.

news.title: Global week ahead: Trade tensions cloud earnings and the G20 heads south
news.summary: The G20 meetings in South Africa next week come at an interesting time for the country. The country will be hosting the G20 summit from November 19 to 20.

news.title: When my friend was on her deathbed, her parents took $25,000 in cash and won’t give it to her son. Do we tell him?
news.summary: “They are a very religious family. These are the same people who hug the altar every week,” says a friend of the family.

news.title: ‘We are blessed’: My husband is inheriting a $1 million home. Should he put it in my name too?
news.summary: “We do not live in a community-property state. We have one son who is now a young adult,” she says.

news.title: I’m 85 with 2 kids and $4 million. My daughter wants a larger share of my estate than my son to compensate for unequal treatment by her father.
news.summary: “My daughter has severe health issues — lymphoma, which is now in remission,” she says. “My son has severe mental health issues.” “I’m very proud of him. He’s a great kid.’

news.title: I put my $500K inheritance into a joint account with my husband. Can I leave half of it to my son from a previous marriage?
news.summary: “If I predecease my husband, my will states that my son will receive half of this account,” she said.

news.title: I’m 70, a widow and struggled financially. How do I let go of the resentment I feel towards my wealthy, unhelpful brother?
news.summary: “I’m now doing better financially than I ever thought I would. My house in Tucson is valued at $416,000.”
